title: Starter Series Eternals for Supports
body: The starter series eternals for most support champions are useless/boring for the champions since even if you get them unlocked you won't get much tracked since most the stuff you avoid since you give them to other players mostly imo the only thing that really gets tracked is the takedowns and those aren't really interessting even for basic stuff since 99% of the time it just tracks your assists which doesnt really seem enjoyable for basic support eternals
